name: No More Polygons!
description:
Cosmonauts! Get set.. ready... go!

As the cosmonauts of the universe, your duty is to clean up after the multiple wacky planets in the entire galaxy.

Now, get in there, pick up some objects and store it in the infinity box!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Enter - Interact

Escape - menu

Side note: This game is still in development. Thank you for your patience and support!

To be released: 

  • Level Builder
  • Multiplayer Support
